title: Unnatural Keyboard/Mouse Feeling
body: Can anyone help me? My keyboard and mouse feel really unnatural suddenly and I'm not sure why. Is there any settings I could change to help this?

replies.body:
Is it the feel of the buttons/responsiveness or does it feel like your posture is off? If it feels like your posture is off just try moving your stuff forward/back/sideways until you find somewhere comfortable again. If it's the actual buttons/responsiveness then with mouse settings at least you can fiddle with the sensitivity, keyboard is a bit harder.

Try to nail down what it is that's making you feel that way and you'll find it a much easier problem to fix.
